explanations.reason: The paper focuses on developing a regime switching design of the fuzzy analytic hierarchy process (FAHP) and improving its functionality under the choice-varying priority (CVP) problem. It discusses Multi-Criteria Decision Making (MCDM) problems, expert consistency prioritization, and financial risk assessment using fuzzy Monte-Carlo simulation. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, neural networks, or large language models are mentioned or relevant to the paper's content.
